title: Yee Haw! The Real Lives of the Cowboys
description: We all know the gun-slinging movie hero, but what was life really like for the cowhands of the old West? This informative book details the real hardships and dangers of the cowboy life and recounts the fascinating story of how cowboys became famous just as that way of life was ending. Historical photographs enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: branded, cattle drives, chaps, chuck wagon, circling, dung, grueling, icon, mustangs, navigator, nonperishable, rustlers, slaughterhouses, stampede, vaqueros, wranglers
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Parentheses                : Identify and understand the use of parentheses in text
awareness: Word Origins                : Identify English words with non-English origins
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
